mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, nickname, created_at, state, profile_img) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{created_at}, #{state}, #{profile_img});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM user WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT id FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickname = #{nickname} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user SET password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
